dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Overview of your subscriptions and expenses.

notifications.empty_description: You're all caught up! We'll notify you when something important happens.

welcome.title: Welcome to SubCare, {{username}}!
welcome.content: We are glad to have you on board. Start tracking your subscriptions today.

verify_code.title: Security Verification Code
verify_code.content: Your verification code is {{code}}. It expires in {{expireMinutes}} minutes.

reset_request.title: Password Reset Request
reset_request.content: We received a request to reset your password. Please check your email to continue.

reset_success.title: Password Reset Successful
reset_success.content: Your password has been reset. You can now login with your new password.

new_login.title: New Login Detected
new_login.content: Your account was accessed from a new device at {{time}}.

created.title: Subscription Added
created.content: You have successfully added {{name}} to your subscriptions.

deleted.title: Subscription Deleted
deleted.content: {{name}} has been removed from your subscriptions.

renew_reminder.title: Renewal Reminder
renew_reminder.content: {{name}} is about to renew. Estimated cost: {{amount}}.

generated.title: New Bill Generated
generated.content: A new bill for {{name}} is ready for confirmation.

skipped.title: Renewal Skipped
skipped.content: You have skipped the renewal for {{name}}.

price_hike.title: Price Hike Warning
price_hike.content: We detected a price increase for {{name}}. Please check the details.

not_found_page.title: Page Not Found
not_found_page.description: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

42200.PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password must be at least {{min}} characters.

error.50000: System error, please try again later.
